name: That Time Where Clock Stop - Demo
name_original: That Time Where Clock Stop - Demo
description:
It’s time to wake up. You woke up in front of the entrance of your school. At least, you think it’s your school. You couldn’t remember anything; your name, your home address, nothing. An ominous figure, arrogant and heartless, hints at how they are the key to unlocking your past… at a steep price. Will you dye your hands red? Or will you struggle against despair? Still… it’s time to wake up.


We'll keep working on the game for future updates, so we'll wait for your comments, critics, and suggestions!
